{"step_by_step_thinking": "The masticatory space is associated with the muscles of mastication, which are located near the mandible. Document [1] states that 81.8% of patients with masticatory space infection had a suspected dental cause of infection. Document [30] also mentions that the most frequent dental source of deep neck infection, which can involve the masticatory space, was a periapical infection of the first mandibular molar.
